lead_paragraph: Steve Wilson of Ocean Springs, Miss., defeated Todd Mitchell of Bloomington, Ind., 5 and 4, in the 36-hole finale of the United States Mid-Amateur Championship to earn an invitation to next year’s Masters. Wilson, 38, one-putted nine times in the first 18 holes to take a 2-up lead into the afternoon session in River Hills, Wis. He finished with 14 one-putts in 32 holes.
